channel.title: Vindictive PVP - Turning white dots to red! (New Media!) (Beta: 3 days!)
channel.description:
[img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/coolte10.png[/img]
Status: Beta-Closed Date of Beta Testing: October 11th-13th Date of Grand Opening: December 10th Forums: N/A Web-client: N/A Download: N/A Development Team Thread: N/A
The source I am using can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646105.0.html, although I decided to take that server down for some reconstruction; during this reconstruction period I decided that I wanted to attempt something I've never had any preexistence experience with, and that is a PVP server. I've removed all skills, useless npcs, objects, and reformed the combat even further than the first opening of Vindictive PK. This started off as a learning experience, but has turned into something I actually dedicate effort into. I have learned a lot, and plan to host this once I feel comfortable with my progress, get a new computer, and settle some college expenses. I will be needing a dedicated professional development team, along with experienced beta testers to help me during the beta weekend it will be open in October. (All beta testers will receive a fair amount of in-game compensation.) My main goal for this server is not to take over the RSPS leader boards, or become the "#1 private server!" as so many claim, but to create a comfortable PK'ing experience like we had growing up, along with a dedicated staff team that actually cares about their players and does not profiteer off of them, which leads me into one of my biggest decisions, and that is to totally fund the server off of my own expenses and refuse to take donations of any kind. All that I require is you donate your time and effort.
What do we have to offer? - Flawless Combat/Switching (Includes: Mage, Melee, and Range) - Fast PK'ing with many gear commands including ::hybrid, tribrid, welfbrid, purebrid, dharoks, range, melee, rangetank, pots, food, barrage, veng, zerker, and many more. - Unrestricted spawn aside from PVP shop items - No overpowered weaponry of any kind - Many PVP locations located all over the world outside of banks - A dedicated development team willing to go the extra mile - Clean game frame - Lag free
Media:
(Pictures) [img]http://i76.servimg.com/u/f76/16/16/97/89/110.png[/img] (Videos)
More to be added soon! Support if you wish! Thanks for keeping up!

item.title: Vindictive PVP - Turning white dots to red! (New Media!) (Beta: 3 days!)
item.dc:creator: @nolan2131 nolan2131
item.description:
@nolan2131 wrote:

New Media! Also beta starts in just 3 days! I really appreciate anyone coming on and helping me to perfect it before the opening. I have also decided that there will be completely unrestricted spawn during beta this weekend, so you will be able to get PKP shop items with a simple command. I will post all IDs upon Beta release! Thanks for keeping up


Read full topic

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/357738-adding-snow-xmas-pi.html

To remove just follow the tut backwards of course.
